result.execSummary:
The defendant Cristian O. Gomez was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess w/ Intent-THC (>2500-10,000 g) [Modifiers: Possession with Intent to Deliver/Distribute a Controlled Substance On or Near a School], a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1m)(h)4.

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes:
Pay court costs and Department of Corrections Supervision fees. Court costs are paid in full.
--------------------

No medications without valid prescription. NO alcohol. No drugs or drug paraphernalia. 
--------------------

Provide biological specimen to state crime lab for DNA analysis, and pay DNA analysis surcharge. Counseling as recommended by Probation Agent. 
--------------------
AODA assessment and follow through with recommendations.

timeConds.notes:
The Defendant is to serve sixty (60) days with work release privileges to commence on or before November 15, 2022 @ 8:00 a.m. NOTE: The Defendant shall report on time and with no detectable amount of alcohol,  or controlled substances without a valid prescription. Failure to comply will result in revocation of work release privileges for a period of five (5) days unless reinstated by the Court. 
--------------------
IT IS HEREBY ORDERED THAT the defendant's excess work release funds be applied to any & all outstanding Court obligations while serving his mandatory jail sentence. 
--------------------
The Defendant is to complete fifty (50) hours of community service work during EACH year of his three (3) year term of probation for a total of one-hundred and fifty (150) hours with NO BUYOUT.

defendant.name: Gomez, Cristian O.

records.addlTxt: BOND QUASHED

Defendant Cristian O. Gomez in court.  Attorney Brad Lochowicz for Keith Kolby Venema in court for Cristian O. Gomez.  Plaintiff State of Wisconsin in court by ADA JJ Crawford. Called @ 3:55 p.m. Appearances made. Matter before the Court for plea and sentencing as to both files - 22CF134 & 22CF374. Record by Atty. Lochowicz as to agreement of the parties. Court goes over maximum penalties and deportation warnings. Defendant responds to Court's questions regarding plea questionnaire. Atty. Lochowicz responds to Court's questions regarding entry of plea and factual basis. 
Defendant enters following pleas:
GUILTY COUNT #1 IN EACH FILE - 22CF134 AND 22CF374.  REMAINING COUNT(S) DISMISSED AND READ-IN.
Court finds pleas to be knowing, voluntary, intelligent, and finds defendant guilty. 
Defendant does not make a statement to the Court.
Court adopts the agreement of the parties - *SEE ATTACHED PLEA AGREEMENT**
Parties have nothing further. Court in recess.

Defendant Cristian O. Gomez in court.  Attorney Keith Kolby Venema in court for Cristian O. Gomez.  Plaintiff State of Wisconsin in court by ADA Samuel Berg. Called @ 2:24 pm. Appearances made. Matter before the Court for plea and sentencing, but Atty. is asking for more time. Court grants.
Status conference scheduled for September 15, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Randomly reassigned:  Case will remain assigned to Judge Reddy after August 1, 2022.

Defendant Cristian O. Gomez in court.  Plaintiff State of Wisconsin in court by DDA James Sempf.  Attorney Keith Kolby Venema in court for Cristian O. Gomez. Called @ 2:29 p.m. Appearances made. Matter before the Court for status on 22CF134 and waiver of preliminary hearing on 22CF374.
As to Waiver of Prelim on 22CF374 - Court goes over wavier form with the defendant who responds to Court's questions. Court finds waiver to be given freely, knowingly, and intelligently.
State has information and Atty. Venema enters not guilty pleas as to all charges, reserves rights and reserves speedy.
Court sets both matters over for plea and sentencing as requested by Atty. Venema.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 22, 2022 at 01:15 pm.

Defendant Cristian O. Gomez not in court. Attorney Keith Venema appears on behalf of the defendant. Plaintiff State of Wisconsin in court by Attorney Andrew Herrmann. Called @ 3:33 p.m. Appearances made. Matter before the Court for initial appearance on22CF374 and 2nd status on 22CF134. Record by Atty. Venema regarding call from defendant's father that they were in an accident on way to court. He has gone over the charges and penalties and was prepared to waive preliminary hearing. Asks that matter be set over to next week for waiver of preliminary hearing. Court sets as requested.
Status conference scheduled for July 22, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
Signed bond filed with the court.

BOND TO COVER 22GF647 & 22CF134

Defendant must comply with Pretrial Services. Defendant shall not possess or consume alcohol. Defendant shall not possess or use illegal drugs or drug paraphernalia. Defendant will not possess any firearms, ammunition or other weapons. Defendant will not in any way contact or attempt to contact any victim(s) listed and will avoid their residence/place of employment or any place they are located and will avoid causing any other person, other than defendant's attorney, from doing so on defendant's behalf.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as through the mail, by telephone, by way of electronic device, in person, or through a third party.  VICTIM(S)/RESIDENCE(S): NO CONTACT WITH DELAVAN-DARIEN HIGH SCHOOL. Defendant shall personally ensure that payments are made under any Order for Income Withholding if the Court appoints an attorney for the defendant.

Prosecuting attorney James T. Sempf in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Cristian O. Gomez in court, in custody by video. Attorney Obi Uzowulu appeared for bond purposes only. Total bond set, cash already posted. Future dates remain. Minutes filed.

Prosecuting attorney James T. Sempf in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Cristian O. Gomez in court.  Attorney Keith Kolby Venema in court for Cristian O. Gomez. Asking for another status in 45 days. Working towards resolution. Minutes filed.
Status conference scheduled for July 14, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Scheduling Order will be provided to Attys via e-filing by the Court

2:15 PM (64-06) Defendant Cristian O. Gomez in court.  Attorney Keith Kolby Venema in court for Cristian O. Gomez.  Attorney Andrew Herrmann  in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Matter was scheduled for a preliminary hearing but the defendant wishes to waive his right to a preliminary hearing.  Response by Counsel and defendant to Court's questions.  Court finds defendant freely, knowingly and voluntarily waives his right to a preliminary hearing and binds the defendant over. 
Attorney Venema acknowledged receipt of the Information, waived reading and plead not guilty to all charges on behalf of his client.
Status conference scheduled for May 27, 2022 at 01:15 pm.

Adj. 2:19 PM
Plaintiff's Demand and Motion for Discovery and Inspection.
